question: Shale Gas is becoming more and more popular in today’s Global Gas Exploration Market. Which among the following property of Shale Gas makes it a potential replacement to the conventional Natural gas?
option1: Its distinct Chemical Property which makes it less polluting
option2: Its distinct physical property which makes it easy to store & handle
option3: It’s cost effective production comparing to the conventional Gas
explanation: Shale gas is natural gas that is found in shale formations. It has become a significant source of natural gas. It is becoming more and more popular in today’s Global Gas Exploration Market, because of its abundance.
